<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thunderblast Slippers](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2331)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 151 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn footwear

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Unassuming in appearance, these slippers indicate their nature only with a signature strip of yellow stitching. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You move like the wind, with precision and speed. You Stride up to 60 feet; this movement doesn't trigger reactions. When you stop, if you've moved at least 30 feet from where you started, you release a thunderous 5-foot emanation that deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage and 2d6 sonic damage with a DC 25 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. A creature that critically fails its save is also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Thunderblast Slippers (Greater)

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The distance you can Stride increases to 120 feet, the damage is 3d6 of each type, and the Fortitude DC is 34.
